CustomField.formula: IF( CWS_Meddic_Position__c = "Positive", IMAGE('/resource/1623182920000/flag_green?',"Meddic Value Greater than 3",30,30), IF( CWS_Meddic_Position__c = "Unknown", IMAGE('/resource/1623182974000/Flag_yellow?',"Meddic Value 3.0",30,30), IF( CWS_Meddic_Position__c = "Negative", IMAGE('/resource/1623182960000/Flag_Red?',"Meddic Value Less than 3.0",30,30), IMAGE('/resource/1620847749000/Flag_Purple?',"Meddic Not Completed",30,30))))
CustomField.label: Meddic Flag
